dimensional_item_cannons.dimstone.posWri: §4Move §7%d meters or less §4of §7%s §4to get the minimum needed shell tier of §7%s
dimensional_item_cannons.how_to_use:
How to use your Dimensional Item Cannon:
 1. Bind a Dimensional Stone to a chest: Sneak and right-click on the chest with a Dimensional Stone.
 2. Find suitable position: Locate a spot in another dimension which is 3 dimensionally close to your target chest. Right-click a block with the Dimensional Stone to see how far away you are from a required position.
 3. Place your Dimensional Item Cannon
 4. Insert the Dimensional Stone: Place the bound Dimensional Stone into the cannon.
 5. Load Dimensional Shells into the Cannon: Check your bound Dimensional Stone to find out which shell tier you need.
 6. Place the item(s) you want to send into the cannon. 
 7. Activate the cannon: Power the cannon using redstone.
 8. Enjoy!
